hymn.title: Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty

lyrics.stanza: Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty! Unto everlasting days our song shall rise to Thee; Holy, Holy, Holy, Merciful and Mighty! God in Three Persons, blessed Trinity!
Holy, Holy, Holy! though the darkness hide Thee, Though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see, Only Thou art holy, there is none beside Thee Perfect in power, in love, and purity.
